text: Motion
Motion

Hey, Mikoto.
What's up at this hour?
Ah... Producer-san.

The air in my room
felt really dry, so...
I see...

...Yeah.
I was thinking of buying a drink.

Maybe it's because of the air conditioner.
Did you try adjusting it?

Yeah... Maybe it's the air conditioner.
I'll check when I get back to my room.
...Would you like something to drink, Producer?
Oh, I'll get it for you.
...Really?

Oh, right, there's a vending machine over there.
What do you want?
Then, just water.
Here you go.

Thank you.
...Cheers.

Vending machines in places like this
are usually expensive.

Is that so?
Then, about the money...

Oh, it's okay.
Sorry, I didn't mean it that way.

...I see.
Well then, I'll enjoy it.
